title: Khuche!
content:
Khuche!

Ne kamolu kase…

…khembunyilisia

bufundo bwe chisokisi

chinjafu.

Khembunyilisia arufu ye

kamaua kamalayi.

Ne chimoni chase . . .

…nabone ekhungu

yasutile kumpila.

Mbona epusi esangafu.

Nekumunwa kwange…

…khomba kamechi

kenyanja kalimo

echumbe.

Khomba kamechi

kamanulu kelichungwa.

Ne kumukhono kwange

...

…mbukula kumukhono

kwoo.

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Carole Bloch

Illustration: Thembinkosi Kohli

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
sentences:
Ne kamolu kase…

…khembunyilisia

bufundo bwe chisokisi

chinjafu.

Nekumunwa kwange…

…khomba kamechi

kenyanja kalimo

echumbe.

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Carole Bloch

Illustration: Thembinkosi Kohli

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
author: Global Storybooks

title: Wandayase omutiti omukara
content:
Wandayase omutiti omukara

Ninyokha nabwana kumulilo.

Nakhasia kamechi.

Nasaka chikhu.

Nayusia muningilo.

Neyao asi.

Nasinga chisaani.

Sikila sina nekhalabana lukani...

... ne wandayase kenyaa busa.

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Mlungisi Dlamini, Ingrid Schechter

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
sentences:
Wandayase omutiti omukara

Ninyokha nabwana kumulilo.

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Mlungisi Dlamini, Ingrid Schechter

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
author: Global Storybooks

title: Basoleli babili be njala
content:
Basoleli babili be njala

Ben nende Thabo bali basoleli babili be njala.

Kukhu khang'ona chikeki chinditi likhumi.

Akhachira khusaani.

Ben abukula abukula ekeki enditi endala.

Thabo abukula chikeki chinditi chibili.

Ben abukula chikeki chinditi chine.

Thabo abukula chikeki chinditi chibili.

Chikeki chinditi chinga nicho Ben kalia?

Chikeki chinditi chinga nicho Thabo kalia?

Chikeki chinditi chinga chiramile kukhu?

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Bronwen Heath

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
sentences:
Basoleli babili be njala

Ben nende Thabo bali basoleli babili be njala.
Ben abukula abukula ekeki enditi endala.
Chikeki chinditi chinga nicho Ben kalia?
Chikeki chinditi chinga nicho Thabo kalia?

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Bronwen Heath

Translation: Ursula Nafula

Language: bxk
author: Global Storybooks

title: Chibarwa
content:
Chibarwa

Lichonekha nanyolile

chibarwa chingali.

Olwabarasa omusilihi

wase kaandikile

omwalimu wase

ebarwa.

Wamakina alikho

aluala. Harama engo.

Mu mulimo kibili

nanyolile ebarwa

khukhwama mukilasi

yase.

Sosa bwangu

Wamakina!

Lwakhataru nanyolile

ebarwa khukhwama wo

musale wange wo

kumwoyo.

Nakhuchorera ewe

sifwanani sino. Busime

khukhwama khu

Wandanje.

Lwokhune nanyolile

ebwarwa khukhwama

khu mayi wase.

License: [CC-BY-NC]

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Cathy Feek

Translation: Joseph Saka

Language: bxk
sentences:
Olwabarasa omusilihi

wase kaandikile

omwalimu wase

ebarwa.

Mu mulimo kibili

nanyolile ebarwa

khukhwama mukilasi

yase.

Lwakhataru nanyolile

ebarwa khukhwama wo

musale wange wo

kumwoyo.

Lwokhune nanyolile

ebwarwa khukhwama

khu mayi wase.

Text: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi

Illustration: Cathy Feek

Translation: Joseph Saka

Language: bxk
